stories.text:
Hi all, this is the inaugural "Meet the Batch" post that we discussed a few days ago: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=27877280. There are 8 startups in this thread. I've attempted to squeeze them all in the title above. The initial order is random.

Feel free to engage with founders by commenting on their posts! Assuming my software works, they should all have been notified to keep an eye on this thread. However, they're in a lot of different time zones, so it may take a while before you start to see responses.

Direct links to the launch posts:

Portão 3 (YC S21) - Corporate travel for Latin America https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=27930563

Sitenna (YC S21) - a marketplace for wireless cell sites https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=27930564

ContainIQ (YC S21) - Kubernetes observability based on eBPF https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=27930569

Appollo (YC S21) - A single API for launching to eCommerce platforms https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=27930570

Shimmer (YC S21) - online video support groups for mental health https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=27930565

Telm.ai (YC S21) - Real-time data quality monitoring https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=27930566

Filadd (YC S21) - Online courses for LatAm university entrance exams https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=27930567

Beau (YC S21) - Automate repetitive client-facing tasks https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=27930568
